basics.name: HUGO ENRIQUE GOMEZ PEREZ
basics.label: Software Architect
basics.summary: MCS on artificial intelligence applied to education And Computer Science Engineer. Experienced on fullstack development for more than 6 years, building solutions for the goverment, national and international companies. He has earned a lot of knowledge by making architectural decisions on components that affected more than 100k users and by selecing the right coding styles, frameworks and development process for the whole programming department (over 400 developers).

work.summary: I am in charge of setting the programming standars in the Java language, Android platform and Security guidelines in the development process. My responsabilities include selecting the right technical tools for developers, best code organization, style, frameworks and libraries. I am also in charge of defining the selection, clasification and promotion of the programmers in the entire company (over 400 developers)
highlights: Created an Autorization architecture that removed the need of recompiling components on permission changes, reducing the number of incident reports by 30%
Introduced TDD and database mocking, reducing a system configuration time from 3 days to 5 minutes
Developed a C++ Database Connection API based on OTL template framework, this completly removed the mantenibility changes when a table field changed, as the types where dinamically generated

Created a component to replace Java Applets that allowed the Web to use Biometric Sensor Autentication, this allowed over 500 systems to get out of the compatibility problem in browsers and simplified the process
Settled the java and Android Coding Styles, libraries and architecture
Taught the Java and Android courses in the company, influencing over 100 employees
Managed to deliver on time the 2013 Sinaloa Elections System
Created an algorithm for the polling stations required for the entire Sinaloa State, based on geographical data
Maintenance leader, in charge of canalizing the changes to the appropriate programmer
Query Optimizations across the system to fulfill the quality standars, average query time reduced from 5 min to < 30 ms
Successful implementation of a phonegap project, deploying on both IOS and Android

work.summary: IT Infraestructure, virtualization and Security consultant in products from VMWARE, CITRIX AND SYMANTEC.
highlights: Technical presentations to IT managers of the most important enterprises in culiacan
Demo and production installation of solutions, including Vmware VSphere, Symantec Endpoint, Citrix Server
